abstract: Icahn Enterprises, the publicly traded holding company run by billionaire Carl C. Icahn, reported a loss of $468 million in the fourth quarter on Thursday as the performance of the firm’s hedge fund and other investments plummeted.
lead_paragraph: Icahn Enterprises, the publicly traded holding company run by billionaire Carl C. Icahn, reported a loss of $468 million in the fourth quarter on Thursday as the performance of the firm’s hedge fund and other investments plummeted.
